name: Truworth Wellness
description: Truworth holds an industry experience of over 5 years of implementing successful wellness programs across various top organizations across India. Our mission is to help you gain a competitive edge by promoting a culture of health & wellbeing throughout your organization. Truworth Wellness was founded in 2011 with the core mission of promoting the culture of preventive wellness across various organizations. We started off by providing employee health checkups & biometric screenings and slowly diversified into providing a complete end to end employee health benefits solution.
Headline: India’s #1 Holistic Corporate Wellness Company
ShortDescription: Truworth Wellness provides Innovative employee wellness engagement programs & employee assistance programs.

Highlights.name: Health Risk & Immunity Assessment
Highlights.description: Identify the key risk areas to your health & immunity. Take suggested measures to reduce the risks.

Highlights.name: Wellness Goals
Highlights.description: Set your overall wellness goals and the platform will suggest you steps to achieve your goal.

Highlights.name: Vitals & Wellness Trackers
Highlights.description: Whether it is your sleep, steps, mood, sugar, BP, Cholesterol, or Thyroid - the platform has it all to help you track your vitals.

business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently

name: Finnpartners
description: In December 2011, FINN Partners was born. I served 11 years as the co-CEO of a historic agency that carried my father’s name – and mine. Yet after 30-plus years of working at that firm, I realized I wanted to build something different – something bold, meaningful, and amazing for clients, our colleagues, and the communities in which we operate. “Amazing” was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be “amazing” every day. I aimed to create a place where talented people could gather – virtually or in person – and do big things for clients, and make a difference in the communities important to us.
Headline: Who we are drives everything we do.
ShortDescription: 1400+ People. 3 Continents. 34 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

Highlights.name: Global, Independent Communications Agency
Highlights.description: According to the document, FINN Partners is a global, independent communications agency [1]. This means that they are a large, international company that is not affiliated with any other agency or organization [1]. This can give them the flexibility and resources to provide a wide range of services to their clients.

Highlights.name: Diverse Range of Communication Services
Highlights.description: The document says that FINN Partners offers a variety of services including brand strategy, content marketing, public relations and influencer marketing [1]. This means that they can help businesses with all aspects of their communications strategy, from developing a brand identity to creating and distributing content to managing media relations and influencer outreach.

Highlights.name: Committed to Positive Change
Highlights.description: The document says that FINN Partners is committed to driving positive change for its people, clients and the world [1]. This suggests that they are a company that is not just focused on profits, but also on making a positive impact on the world. This could be through their work with clients, their commitment to diversity and inclusion, or their support for social and environmental causes.

name: IIHT
description: IIHT is an Indian training institute that offers courses in hardware and software technologies. The institute has multiple branches across India and provides undergraduate, diploma, and postgraduate diploma programs.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: OUR PLATFORM. YOUR ARSENAL.
ShortDescription: Our deep expertise and 25+ years of experience in corporate training enable us to create training programs that deliver highly engaging, immersive learning experiences that ensure learning agility.

Highlights.name: Customizable Learning Ecosystems
Highlights.description: IIHT offers customizable learning ecosystems that connect workforce learning data and training programs.This means that IIHT can create a learning experience that is tailored to the specific needs of each organization.

Highlights.name: Variety of Training Delivery Models
Highlights.description: IIHT offers a variety of training delivery models, including instructor-led training, online learning, and blended learning . This means that IIHT can provide a training solution that meets the needs of any learner.

Highlights.name: Hands-on Learning Experiences
Highlights.description: IIHT provides hands-on learning experiences that help learners apply their knowledge and skills to real-world situations . This can help learners to retain information and develop the skills they need to be successful in their careers.

name: Papaya Global
description: Founded in 2016 by Eynat Guez, Ruben Drong, and Ofer Herman, Papaya Global is (finally!) bringing true technological advancements to the very traditional world of payroll – and helping connect the many fragmented dots between finance, HR, and payroll. With this innovative mindset, the company was able to disrupt the space in various ways – from automating what used to be a long list of repetitive manual tasks in hiring, onboarding, and payroll management, to leading the way in remote work and global EoR solutions, all the way to becoming the first global payroll provider to develop its own native payments platform dedicated to the complex and sensitive nuances of payroll.
features: Paternity / Maternity Leave-Ten days on the company account (in addition to any legal benefits)
Seniority Bonus-$10,000 options grant upon completing three full years at the company
Learning & Development-Up to $1000 budget for online courses, second language courses, classes, seminars, or other developmental activities (per calendar year, based on company policy)
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Meet Papaya OS The only payments and payroll platform designed for a global workforce
ShortDescription:
Automate your global payroll & payments.
 Accelerate success.
 Everything you need to grow your company, all on one operating system.

name: Enparadigm
description: enParadigm leverages Generative AI & Immersive AI solutions to create hyper-personalised, immersive experiences, driving business impact and behavioural change across levels and functions. We have been recognized among the fastest growing tech companies in APAC by Deloitte as part of the Deloitte Tech Fast 500 APAC program. We leverage our proprietary simulations, and a rigorous sustained-learning approach. Learn more about our work.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Experiential Learning That Works
ShortDescription: Crafting talent for the Future of Work with world-class Experiential Learning & Talent Intelligence

Highlights.name: Catalyx - Talent Intelligence & Experiential Learning Platform
Highlights.description: Enparadigm’s Talent Intelligence & Experiential Learning Platform enables organizations to profile, assess and develop employees’ competencies to achieve role-fit for the Future of Work.

Highlights.name: Compass - Hybrid Learning Journeys and Talent Development Programs
Highlights.description: Enparadigm’s Hybrid Talent Development Programs use our proprietary simulation-driven blended learning methodologies.

Highlights.name: Confluence - Business simulations platform
Highlights.description: Prepare your team for real-world business challenges through immersive business simulations in a safe digital environment.

name: Interview Mocha
description: At iMocha, we leverage AI to help you build a skills-first organization by transforming every employee, and every job role into skills with precise proficiency levels. By helping you create taxonomies for job roles, and skills inventories based on your employees, we can turn you into a truly skills-first organization with actionable data. iMocha (formerly known as interview mocha) is an AI-powered Skills Intelligence Cloud, designed to transform how enterprises approach talent management, talent acquisition, and talent development. We're redefining the talent landscape with a skills-first approach. With multi-channel skills validation, AI-powered technology, combined with our comprehensive library of 2500+ skills, we empower you to derive intelligent insights and unleash the full potential of your workforce.Whether it's strategic workforce planning, supporting internal mobility, managing skills gaps, or enhancing employee development, our platform provides you crucial insights to drive HR and business decisions to become a truly Skills-First organization.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Brewing a Skills-first Planet
ShortDescription: Traditional talent acquisition, and talent management no longer works, because formal jobs can no longer keep up with the changing demands of work and skills.

name: EasyUni
description: Launched in 2012, EasyUni is the first company in Southeast Asia and Middle East to bring over 3,000 universities and colleges from over 20 countries in one website, helping students and parents search, compare and connect with university counselors. We have offices in 3 countries, 30 employees, and serve thousands of students and parents every month.
features: A website with information about universities and colleges
Counseling services for students and parents
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Best IDEA is boss
ShortDescription: EasyUni help students find the right university in Malaysia and abroad.

name: compup
description: CompUp empowers total rewards teams to close the pay gap and build a fair compensation structure. Create & share secure compensation bands, run budget simulations, manage employee increments, auto-generate rewards, and offer a holistic total rewards package - all in one place.
Headline: Helping companies to make fair pay a reality
ShortDescription: Make Compensation Decisions Scientific, Seamless and Equitable

Highlights.name: Compensation Management
Highlights.description: Master over 50% of your organizational costs with data-driven compensation strategies.

Highlights.name: HireSure.ai
Highlights.description: Craft irresistible offers and build engaging workflows that candidates love.

Highlights.name: People Analytics
Highlights.description: Unlock workforce insights and make data-supported choices for optimal performance.

name: HR Anexi / Mentoria
description: HR Anexi empowers HR to lead organizational transformation, offering a comprehensive suite of services for family-owned businesses. From aligning HR strategy with business goals to performance management and employee development, we provide a one-stop solution. Our collaborative approach fosters modern HR practices, ensuring businesses thrive with actionable insights and enhanced employee engagement.
Headline: HR Anexi Makes a Difference, Every Single Day
ShortDescription: HR Anexi helps unlock your people potential

Highlights.name: Full-Spectrum HR Support
Highlights.description: Manage all your HR needs, from structure & performance to compensation & rightsizing.

Highlights.name: Data-Driven Insights
Highlights.description: Conduct employee surveys, assess talent & culture, and identify training needs for strategic HR decisions.

Highlights.name: Top Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: Leverage their proven process to find and place high-performing leaders for your organization.

name: e2i
description: e2i serves as a bridge between workers and employers, connecting with workers to offer job security through job-matching, career guidance and skills upgrading services, and partnering employers to address their manpower needs through recruitment, training and job redesign solutions. e2i is a tripartite initiative of the National Trades Union Congress set up to support nation-wide manpower and skills upgrading initiatives.
features: The Career Trial Programme is part of the suite of career services offered by Workforce Singapore (WSG) and e2i to strengthen the employability of locals, through a short-term stint with an employer
Providing One-Stop, Personalised Services for Your Manpower and Training Needs

e2i works with businesses to create customised professional development programmes which can range from one-off half day masterclasses to in-house training modules and week-long courses for their employees and other select participants.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Career Guidance for Singaporeans. Professional Development and Productivity Solutions for Companies. Connect with us!
ShortDescription: e2i is the empowering network for workers and employers seeking employment and employability solutions.

Highlights.name: Career Conversion Programmes
Highlights.description: Career Conversion Programmes (CCPs) are placement programmes targeted at mid-career switchers, to undergo skills conversion and move into new occupations or sectors that have good prospects and opportunities for progression. Trainees will undergo structured on-the-job training to transit into the new job role.

Highlights.name: Place and Train without Conversion Programmes
Highlights.description: Trainees will undergo structured on-the-job training of up to three months to be upskilled into their new job roles.  e2i works with our partners to develop such programmes to help address manpower shortages in many industries and to tackle skills-gaps among job seekers interested in taking on the available jobs.

Highlights.name: Professional Development Programmes
Highlights.description: e2i works with businesses to create customised professional development programmes which can range from one-off half day masterclasses to in-house training modules and week-long courses for their employees and other select participants.

name: Optum
description: Optum is a leading health solution and care delivery organization. Our work is complex, but our mission is simple: create a healthier world, with you at the center. At Optum, we bring together advanced data and technology, deep clinical experience and professional partnerships — making health care smarter and simpler for you. Optum, part of the UnitedHealth Group family of businesses, is powering modern health care by connecting and serving the whole health system across 150 countries. We combine cutting-edge technology, the world’s largest health care database and vast expertise to improve health care delivery, quality and efficiency. We are revolutionizing health care that serves more than 100,000 physicians, practices and other health care facilities, as well as 127 million individual consumers
Headline: Looking ahead to a healthy new year
ShortDescription: Optum is a health services and innovation company on a mission to help people live healthier lives and to help make the health system work better for everyone.

name: Mentogram
description: Mentogram is a Mentor-led Workforce Accelerator. Our mission is to make college accessible for millions. We partner with universities to launch accelerator-style degrees and certification programs for students and corporates to drive engagement, retention and addressing critical skill gaps in Business Education, Gen AI, Digital Skills, and Soft Skills. Our platform supports personalized upskilling pathways, tokenized gamification, mentoring circles, networking corner and AI-driven career assessments.
features: Ready to deploy next-gen mentorship programme templates
First in kind leadership training centered along mentoring and coaching skills
Customized solutions to strengthen the learning and development initiatives of the company
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline:
Build a future-ready
 workforce through next-gen mentoring
ShortDescription: Mentogram is a Mentor-led Workforce Accelerator. Our mission is to make college accessible for millions.

Highlights.name: Industry-Embedded Learning
Highlights.description: Mentogram offers industry-embedded learning programs [1]. This means that their programs are designed to give you the skills and experience you need to succeed in the real world. The programs are developed in collaboration with industry professionals, so you can be sure that you are learning the latest in-demand skills.

Highlights.name: Bridging the Skills Gap
Highlights.description: Mentogram helps to bridge the gap between what is taught in academia and what is required in the workplace [1]. Their programs are taught by experienced practitioners who can provide you with real-world insights and guidance.

Highlights.name: Comprehensive Learning Platform
Highlights.description: Mentogram's platform offers a variety of features to support your learning, such as mentor-mentee matching, peer-to-peer networking, learning pathways, and Zoom integration [1]. This means that you can connect with mentors and peers, track your progress, and learn at your own pace.
